Text: sound is messed up on WDTV Live. anyone have any tips?

You completely bollocked this one up GF  not your usual quality :-(
The runtime is supposed to be 1h 48m not 48m. last half of the concert is missing. also although i appreciate the quality of 6 channel 24bit 96khz flac, its unplayable by a lot of devices and is unconvertable with every tool i have tried (ffmpeg, mencoder, etc).
